Title: Relates to outdoor restraints of companion animals
Summary: Relates to outdoor restraints of companion animals; prohibits tethering under cruel or inhumane conditions, including during dangerous weather conditions when a weather advisory or warning is in effect; provides for civil penalties for violations.
LawCode: Add ยง353-g, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to outdoor restraint of companion animals
